articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Nominee Drama: Jared Isaacman's Abrupt Exit As NASA Administrator Pick
articles.description: The White House withdrew Jared Isaacman, a Musk ally, as its nominee for NASA administrator, with President Trump set to announce a new candidate. Involved in a controversial shift in focus towards Mars, Isaacman's removal left many in the space industry surprised and Musk reportedly disappointed.
articles.content: The White House unexpectedly pulled its nominee for NASA administrator, Jared Isaacman, on Saturday, removing a close ally of Elon Musk from consideration. President Donald Trump is expected to announce a new nominee soon, according to White House sp... [660 chars]

articles.title: Spike in steel tariffs could imperil Trump promise of lower grocery prices
articles.description: President Donald Trump’s doubling of tariffs on foreign steel and aluminum could hit Americans in an unexpected place: grocery aisles.
articles.content:
NEW YORK (AP) — President Donald Trump’s doubling of tariffs on foreign steel and aluminum could hit Americans in an unexpected place: grocery aisles.

articles.title: White House to announce new NASA chief candidate
articles.description: The White House said Saturday it will announce a replacement candidate to serve as U.S. President Donald Trump’s pick to lead NASA, indicating it will withdraw the nomination of tech billionaire Jared Isaacman.
articles.content:
The White House said Saturday it will announce a replacement candidate to serve as U.S. President Donald Trump’s pick to lead NASA, indicating it will withdraw the nomination of tech billionaire Jared Isaacman.

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Judge Blocks Trump's Move on Venezuelan Work Permits
articles.description: A federal judge in San Francisco stopped the Trump administration from voiding work permits for around 5,000 Venezuelans, challenging an earlier move to terminate their Temporary Protected Status (TPS). The court found that Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem likely overstepped her authority by attempting to invalidate the permits.
articles.content: A federal judge in San Francisco has blocked the Trump administration's attempt to rescind work permits and lawful status documents for roughly 5,000 Venezuelans. This decision comes after the U.S. Supreme Court allowed the termination of Temporary P... [780 chars]

articles.title: Trump to withdraw Jared Isaacman's nomination as NASA chief
articles.description: The White House is pulling the nomination of Jared Isaacman as NASA administrator, saying that the next agency chief should be "in complete alignment" with President Trump's agenda.
articles.content:
Jared Isaacman won't be NASA's next chief after all.
